exact h5.left
exact h4ab.right

ext x
constructor

intro h
rw [mem_sInter]
intro
intro h1
rw [mem_setOf] at h1
by_contra hc
rw [mem_compl_iff, mem_sUnion] at h
push_neg at h
have h2 := h tᶜ
have h3 := h2 h1
rw [← mem_compl_iff] at hc
exact h3 hc

intro h
rw [mem_sInter] at h
intro hc -- it did by_contra and rw automatically!
rw [mem_sUnion] at hc
obtain ⟨w, hw⟩ := hc
have h' := h wᶜ
rw [mem_setOf, compl_compl] at h'
have h'' := h' hw.left
rw [mem_compl_iff] at h''
exact h'' hw.right

rw [mem_compl_iff, mem_sInter] at h
push_neg at h
obtain ⟨w, hw⟩ := h
use wᶜ
rw [mem_setOf]
by_contra hc
push_neg at hc
rw [compl_compl] at hc
have h := hc hw.left
rw [← mem_compl_iff] at hw
exact h hw.right

intro h
intro hc -- it again did by_contra and rw automatically!
rw [mem_sUnion] at h
rw [mem_sInter] at hc
obtain ⟨w, hw⟩ := h
rw [mem_setOf] at hw
have hw' := hc wᶜ
have nhw := hw' hw.left
rw [mem_compl_iff] at nhw
exact nhw hw.right

have h2'right := h2'.right
have h1'conc := h1' h2'.left
obtain ⟨t, ht1⟩ := h1'conc
have ht2 := h2'right t
have s_eq_t : s = t := Subset.antisymm ht1.right (ht2 ht1.left)
use s
constructor
exact h2'.left
rw [s_eq_t]
exact ht1.left

rw [mem_sInter] at h3
obtain ⟨t, h2'⟩ := h2
have h3' := h3 t
have h1' := h1 t
have h1'conc := h1' h2'.left
obtain ⟨u, hu⟩ := h1'conc
rw [mem_sUnion]
use t ∩ u
have x_in_u : x ∈ u := h3 u hu.left
constructor
exact hu.right
exact And.intro h2'.right x_in_u

have hgoal_r := hgoal.right

rw [mem_compl_iff, mem_sUnion] at hgoal_r
push_neg at hgoal_r
obtain ⟨t, hgoal_l'⟩ := hgoal_l
have hgoal_r' := hgoal_r t
rw [mem_sUnion]
use t
constructor
constructor
exact hgoal_l'.left
by_contra hc
rw [mem_compl_iff] at hc
push_neg at hc
exact hgoal_r' hc hgoal_l'.right
exact hgoal_l'.right

6.code:
intro x hgoal
have hgoal_l := hgoal.left
have hgoal_r := hgoal.right
rw [mem_sUnion] at hgoal_l
rw [mem_sUnion] at hgoal_r
obtain ⟨t, hgoal_l'⟩ := hgoal_l
obtain ⟨u, hgoal_r'⟩ := hgoal_r
rw [mem_sUnion]
use t
by_contra hc
push_neg at hc
have t_nin_g : t ∉ G
by_contra t_in_g
have contra := hc (And.intro hgoal_l'.left t_in_g)
exact contra hgoal_l'.right
rw [← mem_compl_iff] at t_nin_g
have x_in_family : x ∈ ⋃₀ (F ∩ Gᶜ)
rw [mem_sUnion]
use t
constructor
exact And.intro hgoal_l'.left t_nin_g
exact hgoal_l'.right
have x_in_subset_family := h1 x_in_family
have x_nin_ug := x_in_subset_family.right
rw [mem_compl_iff] at x_nin_ug
exact x_nin_ug hgoal.right

push_neg at hgoalr
obtain ⟨p, hp⟩ := hgoall
obtain ⟨q, hq⟩ := hgoalr
rw [mem_sUnion]
use (p ∩ qᶜ)
rw [mem_setOf]
constructor
use p
constructor
exact hp.left
use q
constructor
exact hq.left
rfl
exact And.intro hp.right hq.right

8.code:
have h2 := h1 {s | ∃ y, y ∈ A ∧ s = {y}}
have h3 : ⋃₀ {s | ∃ y ∈ A, s = {y}} = A
ext x
constructor
intro hx
rw [mem_sUnion] at hx
obtain ⟨w, hw⟩ := hx
rw [mem_setOf] at hw
have hw_left := hw.left
obtain ⟨y, hy⟩ := hw_left
rw [hy.right, mem_singleton_iff] at hw
rw [← hw.right] at hy
exact hy.left
intro hx
rw [mem_sUnion]
use {x}
rw [mem_setOf]
constructor
use x
rw [mem_singleton_iff]
have h4 := h2 h3
rw [mem_setOf] at h4
obtain ⟨z, h⟩ := h4
use z
exact h.right
